Description: A unqiue identifier specific to the spatial layer (required field)
The spatial geometry type of the layer such as "Point" or "Polygon"
The process by which the catchment was defined. Categories are "Delineation", "Coastal", or "Coastal Fill" and are described in the product documentation
The unique ID that links catchments to their respective flowlines or riparian buffers
The FEATUREID of the catchment located immediately downstream in the network
The length of the feature in meters (required field)
The length of the feature in kilometers
